author: Kikkoman
title: Soy-glazed bacon popcorn
ingredients: 1 tbsp Kikkoman Naturally Brewed Soy Sauce
2 tbsp Kikkoman Teriyaki BBQ-Sauce with Honey
instructions_list: Heat the oil in a large saucepan and add the popping corn. Cover and cook over medium heat until the popping subsides. Transfer the popcorn to a large bowl.

Fry the bacon slices in a pan until golden but still soft. Then reduce the heat and add the Kikkoman Teriyaki BBQ-Sauce Honey. Let it cook for 2–3 more minutes so the bacon is coated and slightly caramelised. Set aside.
In a separate pan, melt the butter and brown sugar over medium heat, stirring until the sugar dissolves. Add the Kikkoman Soy Sauce and stir until the caramel is smooth and shiny.
category: Desserts, Spring, Summer, Autumn, Winter, Quick Preparation, Snacks
description: Crunchy popping corn glazed in a sweet caramel made with Kikkoman Soy Sauce and topped with sticky teriyaki bacon—smoky, savoury and satisfyingly bold. A flavour-packed twist on the classic snack.
